channel.title: #craft on Conversation with a Tester!
channel.description: Recent content in #craft on Conversation with a Tester!

item.title: Practical issues of implementing Conference-time advice
item.description: It’s 2020, and the pandemic is going on. Everyone (at least from the IT industry) is working from home. Conferences and meetups are virtual and free to some extent or at an economical cost. In all these forums, We chat about testing as a craft. How to be agile, how to explore & Experiment, session-based testing, state-based testing, automation just checks, it’s not testing. We prefer test ideas over test cases, or we write minimal test cases.
